Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Southbound 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Roosevelt, State, Archer and Clark: due to street blockage near Clark/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my route?

 

Southbound #24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Roosevelt, State, Archer, Clark and over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Roosevelt.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Skokie-Dempster. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Skokie-Dempster.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
